alert.note: Alert for Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rockcastle County through 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boone, or 10 miles north of Mount Vernon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Disputanta and Climax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
